translations: abbr.高级实体管理标准（High-level Entity Management System）；家庭能源管理系统（home energy management system）；直升机紧急医疗服务（helicopter emergency medical service）

phrs.translation: 支支吾吾；哼哼哈哈；犹豫

sentences.sentence: You can always unpick the hems on the dungarees if you don't like them.
sentences.translation: 如果不喜欢粗布裤子的贴边，你可以把它拆掉。

sentences.sentence: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.translation: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

sentences.sentence: She deftly rolled the hems a few times so I could stand.
sentences.translation: 她灵巧地把裤筒卷了几下，这样我就能站起来了。
